page.description: Fires when there are no media files to download.

discussion.p: The *[ui:onNoMediaFilesToFetch]* event is triggered when the [Automatically download media files and other linked files when populating the List] property is enabled, but the List data does not have any media files.

link.link: ux%20list%20detail%20view%20properties%20media%20files%20settings#section2_Automatically download media files and other linked files when populating the List

links.link: Automatically download media files and other linked files when populating the List

see.ref: How To Download Files to a Mobile Device
